helpmsg:
Hi there!
I can help you convert anything to anything! I connect to www.cloudconvert.com to do this. Just send me a file and I will tell you everything I can do with it! Most likely you're gonna get done whatever you want to get done.

Telegram restricts bots (like me) to send and receive files with more than 20 MB in size. This means that you will have to visit the website yourself if you need to convert larger files.
